name: Lunar Lich
description:
Lunar Lich is a top-down shooter created for the GB Jam!

Controls:

WASD - Move

M - Shoot Right

N - Shoot Left

M + N - Shoot Up

1 / 2 - Change Current Palette

Libraries used to make Lunar Lich :

  • Bump and Anim8 by Enrique García Cota
  • Maid64 by adekto
  • Hump by Matthias Richter
  • Palette Switcher by Robert Machmer
  • STI (Simple Tiled Implementation) by Landon Manning

A game by Josh Jacobs
